meanings.sent1: Reading a captivating book immerses you in its world.
meanings.sent2: She immerses herself in her work, forgetting everything else.
meanings.sent3: His love for painting immerses him in a sea of colors and emotions.
meanings.sent4: The music immerses the audience in a wave of nostalgia.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly baked cookies immerses the kitchen in warmth and sweetness.

meanings.definition: Dip or submerge in a liquid
meanings.sent1: She carefully immerses the paintbrush in the water to clean it.
meanings.sent2: The chef immerses the vegetables in boiling water to blanch them.
meanings.sent3: The child giggles as he immerses his toy boat in the bathtub.
meanings.sent4: The diver slowly immerses himself in the crystal-clear waters of the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The scientist immerses the sample in a solution to conduct the experiment.
